author.name: Dwayne King
author.text: Founder & CEO @ Rutabaga | Pioneering a System of Action for Product Teams | Unifying Around Customer Needs Accelerating the Deliver of Products Customers Love

author.name: Allison McKeever
author.text:
I connect the work to the intended outcome. 

I seek to understand what stakeholders are looking for and know when to help them rethink what they are asking for.

My ever-growing skill set is the result of working with a diverse set of clients and colleagues on a variety of projects.
